introduction.section1: Travel with us in Southern Vietnam through our travelogue.
introduction.section2: Discover big cities like Ho Chi Minh City, its museum and tunnels, take off to magnificent landscapes around the Mekong Delta River on islands like Ben Tre or visit the Cân Thơ floating market with us.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

meta-description: Travel with us in Southern Vietnam through our travelogue. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
title: Southern Vietnam
